thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Tanya Strusberg
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Tanya Strusberg

author: Tanya Strusberg
title: Tanya Strusberg
text:
I used Pack & Send for the first time last week to send a business package from Melbourne to Sydney. It was picked up on time and delivered the next day, much faster than I actually anticipated it would arrive.
Thank you for such an efficient service, I will definitely be using Pack & Send again.
